title.rendered: TransPecos Banks Names Stephanie Lyles Chief Credit Officer

content.rendered:
Chartwell Partners is pleased to announce the placement of Stephanie Lyles as Senior Vice President and Chief Credit Officer with TransPecos Banks.  Lyles will be responsible for leading the credit risk function for TransPecos Banks’ shareholders and customers, while enabling the bank’s strategic initiatives. Lyles spent the last ten years at Broadway National Bank, most recently as Vice President, Credit Department Manager.

 

“Chartwell Partners is pleased to have served as the executive search firm for this engagement,” said Scott Petty, Managing Partner of Chartwell Partners’ Financial Services Practice.  Stephanie possesses a natural leadership style and the business-focused credit knowledge our client desired.  We look forward to following her impact on TransPecos Banks’ growth.”

 

About TransPecos Banks

TransPecos Banks is a member of the TransPecos Financial Corp., a Texas banking organization with locations throughout the TransPecos Region of West Texas and headquartered in San Antonio.  Certified as a Great Place to Work, TransPecos provides innovative business strategies and the highest level of customer care and leadership in the communities they serve. They are dedicated to achieving exceptional results and creating a great place to work for every one of their associates.  They do this with an unrelenting focus on Vision, Values, Culture, and Standards that support the TransPecos Way of operating.

 

About Chartwell Partners

Chartwell Partners is a national, retained search firm founded in 2005 specializing in executive and board of director leadership recruitment. Partner Scott Petty and his team pride themselves on being one of the best executive search firm recruiting teams in the nation. We are regularly called upon by clients in the Commercial Banking, Community Banking and Mortgage Sectors to recruit C-Suite and other senior executives. As a top executive search firm, it is our job and privilege to meet the executive recruiting needs of our clients.
